Name: Automon
About the game: Every 10 year old has to try to become the Automon Champion! That includes you! Go through various areas to fight, capture and upgrade Automons, defeat bosses and beat the Automon Champion! Manage your team carefully - one defeat and you're done for! Automon is a fast-paced strategic auto-battler that requires careful choices at every step. You'll build a diverse party of cute (and usually violent) Automons to beat a variety of foes. 45 unique monsters to find, catch and upgrade, each with a powerful ability 9 elemental types with different strategies and themes Randomized enemy and boss encounters for a fresh experience every time Amusing grungy visuals A very condescending professor
